ygData.subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Latest Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Just because a skill level can be the same doesn t mean that the others will do as well as a warrior in melee.  My druid has 1hs and offense maxed out at 175
ygData.messageBody:
Just because a skill level can be the same doesn't mean that the
others will do as well as a warrior in melee. My druid has 1hs and
offense maxed out at 175 or 180 or whatever it is.. I just remember
that I've been unable to get it to go up anymore for about 4 weeks and
I kill dwarves a lot, finishing them with melee, just in case I should
ever need it. I'd still put a warrior of equal skill against the same
creature and see it fall a LOT faster. Warriors are good at what they
are good at and letting a ranger increase his skill is not going to
make him equal in melee to the warrior. The day the ranger can really
taunt and melee as well as a warrior is the day I get my ranger back
out of mothballs. Unfortunately, it isn't gonna happen. Nothing
against rangers or paladins or shadowknights, but warriors do their
job well and a few spells won't replace that capability.

Brad Williams
BP_Williams@...

> Offense and weapons skills upgraded to match warrior.
>
